posts.content:
Trying to stop the rattling from my spice rack. There is a small "L" bracket underneath but given how many holes there are I think there was something longer holding it to the door. I have the original top bracket.

Does anyone here have a photo of how it should be?

Thanks in advance.

Don't have a photo of mine to hand but I think your "L" bracket is aftermarket, mine is much slimmer and only has two holes one up top and one on the bottom. Apart from the top bracket on the unit nothing else holds the bottom to the door.

The other holes will be for screws to keep the wooden panel behind the spice unit in place and holes for your bracket.

Hope that helps and yes my spice unit also rattles, don't think you will ever manage to keep the rattle free!

Dr G.
